name: Car City Boom 2
description:
Car City Boom

This is the sequel to Car City boom. Larger map, more cars and introducing boomcoins. 

Drive around the city and collect energy balls. They will keep you alive for longer and you will earn boomcoins. With your boomcoins you can buy new cars.

Controls:

[W] [S] to drive forwards and backwards.

[A] [D] to turn left and right.

[Space] to brake/fly higher.

[Shift] to use rocket boost.
